summary: This document is an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding Jeffrey Epstein's availability for a brief phone call. It indicates that Epstein will be in New York on September 20th and the following week.

persons.name: Lesley Groff

Lesley Groff is acting on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein to communicate his availability.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating communication regarding Jeffrey Epstein's availability.
Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank Private Bank.
Jeffrey Epstein is indicated to be available for a call on September 20th and the following week.
